title: srI raguramam
sahitya:
shrI raghurAmam sItA nAtham shritajana rakSaNam bhajAmi

anupallavi

 sArasOd-bhavAdipu dhaisssam sEvyam sakala surakSaNam danujav visikSaNam

caraNam 1

 nirupama caritamakhila shruti vEdyam niravadhi saukhyA nandasva rUpam 
parama puruSam shubhadam rAmacandrapura nilayam shrIdharam sujana manOharam
